entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix websocket with no auth by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/230
  • Package updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.7.1...v5.7.2

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix status when value is zero by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/234
  • Package updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/235
  • Bump actions/setup-node from 4.3.0 to 4.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/231

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.7.2...v5.7.3
